

sys clock = 16MHz
Timer resloution = 16bit - 0-65535

no clk division
1/16000000 = 6.25X10-8
6.25X10-8 * 65565 = 4.097X10-3sec



Clk/8
1/16000000 = 6.25X10-8
6.25X10-8 * 8 = 5X10-7
5X10-7 * 65565 = 0.0327sec



clk/64
1/16000000 = 6.25X10-8
6.25X10-8 * 64 = 4X10-6
4X10-6 * 65565 = 0.262sec



clk/256
1/16000000 = 6.25X10-8
6.25X10-8 * 256 = 1.6X10-5
1.6X10-5 * 65565 = 1.049sec
